name: Free Tagged
description: This beat is free to use, but it's only available as an MP3 file. The track will have a tag and you must credit me.

name: Common Rights
description: You can upload this beat anywhere for *PRICE*, but it will still have a tag. If your streaming hits a certain threshold, you'll need to compensate me.

name: Exclusive Rights
description: Upload this beat anywhere for *PRICE* without my tag. Credits in the song metadata are still appreciated.

name: Multi-Prod Rights
description: License for when the beat was made by multiple people. Allows multiple producers to share rights.
